overview:
Shivanu is the Co-Founder of Teamie, a social learning platform.

Shivanu has over 6 years of experience as an industry analyst and consultant in the ICT space focused on Enterprise Collaboration, Communications and Customer Experience. Shivanu leverages his strong background in understanding leading technology and industry needs as well as insights on the enterprise social networking space to envision and develop Teamie. Shivanu has been part of advisory engagements with leading technology vendors such as Cisco, Avaya, SAP, Microsoft, Samsung and uses his hands-on consulting experience to craft execution strategies for Teamie that have worked in the ICT market place. Having led a consulting practice as well as heading sales for Asia Pacific for the ICT practice and Public Sector practice at Frost & Sullivan, Shivanu drives product strategy & product development as well as sales & business development at Teamie.

Shivanu was awarded the prestigious SIA-NOL scholarship for his Electrical Engineering program and was part of the Technopreneurship programme at the National University of Singapore.

Shivanu lives in Singapore and enjoys a game of tennis on weekends (when he and his friends get the time to play). In his free time, Shivanu was one of the actors in an award-winning independent movie called “Mausams”, and was part of a theatre production in Singapore.
